channel.title: How do i ip ban somone from my server?
channel.description: i have a server called KScape(short) aand somone keeps telling the admins + us owners to spawn her stuff cause shes a girl and we are appearently being impolite for not doing so... how do i ip ban this person?

item.title: How do i ip ban somone from my server?
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

[quote=“Shadow742000, post:4, topic:438874”][quote author=Crown2 link=topic=541582.msg3967411#msg3967411 date=1333846738]

i have a server called KScape(short) aand somone keeps telling the admins + us owners to spawn her stuff cause shes a girl and we are appearently being impolite for not doing so…
how do i ip ban this person?

dont leech and or look for or make a ip ban command?
[/quote]

how am i possibly leeching?[/quote]

okay so if you dident leech and actually made this source (by that i mean actually did something to it after you downloaded a PI or some shiz like that ) then you should know how to make a command and im pretty sure it already haz that command in there

Read full topic
item.source: How do i ip ban somone from my server?

item.title: How do i ip ban somone from my server?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Shadow742000, post:4, topic:438874”][quote author=Crown2 link=topic=541582.msg3967411#msg3967411 date=1333846738]

i have a server called KScape(short) aand somone keeps telling the admins + us owners to spawn her stuff cause shes a girl and we are appearently being impolite for not doing so…
how do i ip ban this person?

dont leech and or look for or make a ip ban command?
[/quote]

how am i possibly leeching?[/quote]
How do I ban someone? If you were someone making improvements to a source you’d say I can’t find a working ipban and I wish to add one in, can anyone offer any help? <or something like that. The way people talk/body movements give them away. Social engineering is a profession nowadays.

Read full topic

item.source: How do i ip ban somone from my server?

item.title: How do i ip ban somone from my server?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

::ipban or ::ipbanuser (putusername) remove the brackets

or

turn off server for a sec, look into the source files find a ipban text file add the players name in there and save it compile and turn back on the server?

Easier way just demote their ass from staff

::demote (playername)

Read full topic
